languages.text: Перстень украшает мелкая вязь золотых букв: "Севериус Мерагон, первый маршал сего Храма Лекс Империалис, вершивший правый суд, покуда Император не призвал его душу".

traits.locale_text: Перстень украшает мелкая вязь золотых букв: "Севериус Мерагон, первый маршал сего Храма Лекс Империалис, вершивший правый суд, покуда Император не призвал его душу".

languages.text: The ring is adorned with tiny golden lettering: "Severius Meragon, the first Marshal of this temple of the Lex Imperialis, was a righteous judge until the day the Emperor summoned his soul."
languages.original_text: Перстень украшает мелкая вязь золотых букв: "Севериус Мерагон, первый маршал сего Храма Лекс Империалис, вершивший правый суд, покуда Император не призвал его душу".

traits.locale_text: The ring is adorned with tiny golden lettering: "Severius Meragon, the first marshal of this temple of the Lex Imperialis, was a righteous judge until the Emperor summoned his soul."

The ring is adorned with tiny golden lettering: "Severius Meragon, the first Marshal of this temple of the Lex Imperialis, was a righteous judge until the day the Emperor summoned his soul."

languages.text: Der Ring ist mit winzigen Goldbuchstaben geschmückt: "Severius Meragon, der erste Marshall dieses Tempels der Lex Imperia, war ein rechtschaffener Richter bis zu dem Tag, an dem der Imperator seine Seele zu sich rief."
languages.original_text: The ring is adorned with tiny golden lettering: "Severius Meragon, the first Marshal of this temple of the Lex Imperialis, was a righteous judge until the day the Emperor summoned his soul."

traits.locale_text: Der Ring ist mit winzigen Goldbuchstaben geschmückt: "Severius Meragon, der erste Marshall dieses Tempels der Lex Imperia, war ein rechtschaffener Richter bis zu dem Tag, an dem der Imperator seine Seele zu sich rief."

languages.text: L'anneau est gravé de petites lettres dorées : « Severius Meragon, le premier maréchal de ce temple de la Lex Imperialis, est resté un juge droit et juste jusqu'au jour où l'Empereur a appelé à Lui son âme. »
languages.original_text: The ring is adorned with tiny golden lettering: "Severius Meragon, the first Marshal of this temple of the Lex Imperialis, was a righteous judge until the day the Emperor summoned his soul."

traits.locale_text: L'anneau est gravé de petites lettres dorées : « Severius Meragon, le premier maréchal de ce temple de la Lex Imperialis, est resté un juge droit et juste jusqu'au jour où l'Empereur a appelé à Lui son âme. »

languages.text: 这枚戒指上镌刻着精细的金色铭文：“塞维利乌斯·梅拉贡，这座帝国律法圣殿的首任元帅，坚定不移地恪守着正义的道路，一刻不曾松懈，直至帝皇亲自召唤他的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: The ring is adorned with tiny golden lettering: "Severius Meragon, the first Marshal of this temple of the Lex Imperialis, was a righteous judge until the day the Emperor summoned his soul."

traits.locale_text: 这枚戒指上镌刻着精细的金色铭文：“塞维利乌斯·梅拉贡，这座帝国律法圣殿的首任元帅，坚定不移地恪守着正义的道路，一刻不曾松懈，直至帝皇亲自召唤他的灵魂。”

languages.text: El anillo está adornado con una inscripción en oro: «Severius Meragon, primer Mariscal de este templo de la Lex Imperialis, fue un juez justo hasta el día en que el Emperador convocó su alma».
languages.original_text: The ring is adorned with tiny golden lettering: "Severius Meragon, the first Marshal of this temple of the Lex Imperialis, was a righteous judge until the day the Emperor summoned his soul."

traits.locale_text: El anillo está adornado con una inscripción en oro: «Severius Meragon, primer Mariscal de este templo de la Lex Imperialis, fue un juez justo hasta el día en que el Emperador convocó su alma».

languages.text: 指輪には小さな金色の文字でこう刻まれている。「セヴェリウス・メラゴン。レックス・インペリア神殿の初代将帥。皇帝陛下がその魂を召される日まで正義の裁判官だった」
languages.original_text: The ring is adorned with tiny golden lettering: "Severius Meragon, the first Marshal of this temple of the Lex Imperialis, was a righteous judge until the day the Emperor summoned his soul."

traits.locale_text: 指輪には小さな金色の文字でこう刻まれている。「セヴェリウス・メラゴン。レックス・インペリア神殿の初代将帥。皇帝陛下がその魂を召される日まで正義の裁判官だった」

languages.text: Yüzüğün üzerine altın harflerle işlenmiş yazı: "Lex İmperialis tapınağının ilk Miralayı Severius Meragon, ruhunu İmparator çağırdığı güne dek adaletli bir yargıçtı."
languages.original_text: The ring is adorned with tiny golden lettering: "Severius Meragon, the first Marshal of this temple of the Lex Imperialis, was a righteous judge until the day the Emperor summoned his soul."

traits.locale_text: Yüzüğün üzerine altın harflerle işlenmiş yazı: "Lex İmperialis tapınağının ilk Miralayı Severius Meragon, ruhunu İmparator çağırdığı güne dek adaletli bir yargıçtı."
